casebody.data:
Chapman against Raymond. Service of a notice in vacation of a motion to be made in term, on the agent of the attorney in Utica, is suffi.dent. NOTICE of a motion to be made at this term, was served in the vacation, on the agent of the plaintiff’s attorney in Utica.. E. Williams

objected that the service ought to have been on the agent of the attorney in Albany.

Parker,

for the motion.

Per Curiam.

The notice is sufficient.
